name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer bringing 8 years of experience, I possess a strong foundation in **AWS**, **CI/CD**, **Docker**, and **GitHub**, essential for building and deploying enterprise solutions. My extensive background includes developing robust client-server architectures and distributed systems, ensuring performance and scalability in high-demand environments. I am adept at leveraging **Spring**, **Hibernate**, and **Spring Boot** for backend development, complemented by proficiency in database management.

I have a proven track record in leading development initiatives in the healthcare and financial sectors, focusing on compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Although my core expertise lies outside Java technologies, I thrive in dynamic environments where I implement **DevOps** practices to enhance productivity. My experience also includes exposure to **GenAI** tools, ensuring innovative solution delivery. My original strengths in full-stack development with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and cloud services like **Azure** round out my skill set, enabling me to create high-performance applications tailored to the unique needs of each project.
